sql: SELECT C.CategoryName AS category, SUM(OD.Quantity * OD.UnitPrice) AS quantity FROM Orders AS O INNER JOIN "Order Details" AS OD ON O.OrderID = OD.OrderID INNER JOIN Products AS P ON OD.ProductID = P.ProductID INNER JOIN Categories AS C ON P.CategoryID = C.CategoryID WHERE O.OrderDate BETWEEN '1997-06-01' AND '1997-06-30' AND C.CategoryName = 'Beverages' GROUP BY CategoryID ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT ROUND(SUM(T2.UnitPrice * T2.Quantity * (1 - T2.Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT T1.OrderID), 2) AS AOV FROM Orders AS T1 INNER JOIN "Order Details" AS T2 ON T1.OrderID = T2.OrderID INNER JOIN Products AS T3 ON T2.ProductID = T3.ProductID INNER JOIN Categories AS T4 ON T3.CategoryID = T4.CategoryID WHERE T1.OrderDate BETWEEN '1997-12-01' AND '1997-12-31' AND (T4.CategoryName = 'Dairy Products' OR T4.CategoryName = 'Confections');

SELECT T3.ProductName AS product, SUM(T2.UnitPrice * T2.Quantity * (1 - T2.Discount)) AS revenue FROM "Order Details" AS T2 INNER JOIN Products AS T3 ON T2.ProductID = T3.ProductID GROUP BY T3.ProductID ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT ROUND(SUM(T1.UnitPrice * T1.Quantity), 2) AS TotalRevenue FROM Orders AS O INNER JOIN "Order Details" AS D ON O.OrderID = D.OrderID INNER JOIN Products AS P ON D.ProductID = P.ProductID INNER JOIN Categories AS C ON P.CategoryID = C.CategoryID WHERE C.CategoryName = 'Beverages' AND O.OrderDate BETWEEN '1997-06-01' AND '1997-08-31';

SELECT C.CompanyName AS customer, SUM((P.UnitPrice - (P.UnitPrice * 0.7)) * OD.Quantity * (1 - OD.Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT O.OrderID) AS GrossMargin FROM Orders AS O INNER JOIN "Order Details" AS OD ON O.OrderID = OD.OrderID INNER JOIN Products AS P ON OD.ProductID = P.ProductID INNER JOIN Customers AS C ON O.CustomerID = C.CustomerID WHERE O.OrderDate BETWEEN '1997-01-01' AND '1997-12-31' GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY GrossMargin DESC LIMIT 1;
